statements: SELECT * FROM EventRegistration;
SELECT attendee_name, registration_date FROM EventRegistration WHERE payment_status = true;
SELECT event_id, attendee_name, registration_date FROM EventRegistration WHERE payment_amount > 100.00;
SELECT * FROM EventRegistration ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, payment_amount FROM EventRegistration WHERE payment_status = false ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, payment_amount FROM EventRegistration WHERE payment_status = TRUE ORDER BY registration_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM EventRegistration WHERE payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY event_id;
SELECT event_id, attendee_name, registration_date FROM EventRegistration WHERE payment_amount < 50 AND payment_status = TRUE;
SELECT DISTINCT attendee_name FROM EventRegistration WHERE payment_status = FALSE;
SELECT event_id, attendee_name, payment_amount FROM EventRegistration ORDER BY payment_amount DESC, registration_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM event_registrations;
SELECT dancer_name, registration_date FROM event_registrations WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT dancer_name, registration_date FROM event_registrations ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT event_id FROM event_registrations;
SELECT dancer_name, payment_amount FROM event_registrations JOIN event_payments ON event_registrations.registration_id = event_payments.registration_id;
SELECT dancer_name, registration_date FROM event_registrations WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT dancer_name, payment_amount FROM event_registrations JOIN event_payments ON event_registrations.registration_id = event_payments.registration_id;
SELECT dancer_name, registration_date FROM event_registrations WHERE dancer_name LIKE 'John%' AND registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT dancer_name, registration_date FROM event_registrations WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT dancer_name, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM event_registrations JOIN event_payments ON event_registrations.registration_id = event_payments.registration_id GROUP BY dancer_name;
SELECT * FROM DanceEventRegistrations;
SELECT event_id, dancer_name, registration_date FROM DanceEventRegistrations ORDER BY dancer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT event_id, payment_date, amount FROM Payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_id, performance_date, start_time, duration_minutes FROM PerformanceSchedules ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM DanceEventRegistrations WHERE dancer_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT dancer_name, registration_date FROM DanceEventRegistrations WHERE event_id = 12345;
SELECT event_id, dancer_name, registration_date FROM DanceEventRegistrations WHERE registration_date >= '2023-01-01' AND registration_date <= '2023-12-31';
SELECT event_id, SUM(amount) AS total_payment FROM Payments GROUP BY event_id HAVING total_payment > 1000 ORDER BY total_payment DESC;
SELECT event_id, performance_date, start_time FROM PerformanceSchedules WHERE performance_date > '2023-06-01' ORDER BY performance_date ASC, start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM registrations;
SELECT event_id, participant_id FROM registrations WHERE registration_date = '2022-05-15';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT registration_id, event_id, participant_id, registration_date FROM registrations WHERE event_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM registrations WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_id, registration_date FROM registrations ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM performances WHERE performance_time BETWEEN '13:00' AND '15:00';
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 100.00 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM dance_event_registrations;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM dance_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT registration_id, participant_name, registration_date FROM dance_event_registrations WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT performer_name, event_id, performance_date FROM performance_schedule ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT organizer_name, organizer_email FROM event_organizers WHERE organizer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM dance_event_registrations ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, registration_date FROM dance_event_registrations WHERE event_id = 12345;
SELECT registration_id, participant_name, event_name FROM dance_event_registrations JOIN dance_events ON dance_event_registrations.event_id = dance_events.event_id;
SELECT event_name, payment_amount FROM dance_events JOIN event_payments ON dance_events.event_id = event_payments.registration_id WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT organizer_name, organizer_email FROM event_organizers WHERE organizer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY organizer_name ASC;
